titles.title: Authorizing the printing of the Biographical Directory of the United States Congress, 1774-2005.
Authorizing the printing of the Biographical Directory of the United States Congress, 1774-2005.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Mr. Mica moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Con. Res. 138.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the House on April 7, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Requires printing of a revised edition of the Biographical Directory of the United States Congress for the period ending with the 108th Congress.
